molecular.io.read_table¶

molecular.io.read_table(fname, glob=None, sep='\\s+', header=None, ignore_index=True, reindex=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Read table into pandas.DataFrame.

Parameters

  • fname (str) – Name of file.

  • glob (bool or dict) – Does fname need to be globbed? If a boolean, uses glob. If dictionary, uses vglob. (Default: None)

  • sep (str) – Character used to separate columns? (Default: white space)

  • header (bool) – (Default: None)

  • reindex (bool) – (Default: False)

Returns

Data read in.

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

molecular.io.read_pdb

Next topic

molecular.simulations
